page.title: 03'A DAY IN THE LIFE'
page.content:
Mr Twigg gets up at half past six in the morning. He has cereals for breakfast. He is married and works in Leeds as a telephone engineer. In his spare time he enjoys gardening. He goes to bed at 10.30. His wife gets up at the same time - she works in Leeds as a nurse. Mrs Twigg enjoys riding a horse in her spare time. They do not have any children.
They usually have a sandwich for lunch and a cooked meal on an evening. They have a car.
They enjoy living in Thorpe Willoughby because it is quiet. They have lived there for 5 years.
